title: Bermuda Triangle
author: Unknown
pages:
The Bermuda Triangle,
also known as the
Devil's Triangle, is an
urban legend focused
on a loosely defined
region in the western
part of the North
Atlantic Ocean where
a number of aircraft
and ships are said to
have disappeared
under mysterious
circumstances
Ironically, most of the
most infamous stories
take place outside of
the circle. Whilst it may
be more fun to imagine
the circle as a
mysterious spot, it and
it's surrounding areas
are very high traffic
areas for boats and
planes which means
accidents there are
not uncommon
if you are interested
Lemmino has a more
in-depth documentary
involving this very
subject
